snippet: Diego Costa left the Stamford Bridge pitch to exultant cheers after a hat-trick against Swansea City on Saturday highlighted a breathless start to a Chelsea career for a team that has been designed around him....

headline.print_headline: It's Not Normal, Says Mourinho of Costa's Exploits
headline.main: It's Not Normal, Says Mourinho of Costa's Exploits

lead_paragraph: Diego Costa left the Stamford Bridge pitch to exultant cheers after a hat-trick against Swansea City on Saturday highlighted a breathless start to a Chelsea career for a team that has been designed around him.
